Properties.ProtectedString:
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
MouseDown = false
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
Necklace = InsertService:LoadAsset(147198993):GetChildren()[1]:Clone()
Player = nil Character = nil Humanoid = nil
-- Returns a character ancestor and its Humanoid, or nil function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function CastLaser(StartPosition, Direction, MaxDistance, Ignore)
local function RayCast(Pos, Dir, Max, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Pos, Dir.unit * (Max or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
local Hit, EndPosition = RayCast(StartPosition, Direction, MaxDistance, Ignore) local Distance = (StartPosition - EndPosition).magnitude local LaserPart = Instance.new("Part") LaserPart.Name = "Laser" LaserPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") LaserPart.Transparency = 0.5 LaserPart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom LaserPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LaserPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth LaserPart.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic LaserPart.CanCollide = false LaserPart.Anchored = true LaserPart.Locked = true LaserPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, Distance) LaserPart.CFrame = CFrame.new(StartPosition, EndPosition) * CFrame.new(0, 0, (-Distance / 2)) Debris:AddItem(LaserPart, 1) LaserPart.Parent = Character
return Hit, EndPosition, LaserPart
end
function Fire() if Tool.Enabled and Humanoid.Health > 0 then Tool.Enabled = false
PlaySound.Value = "11944350"
local StartingPosition = Handle.Position + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * (Handle.Size.Z / 2)
local HandleClone = Handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame + HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((Handle.Size.Y / 2) - 0.25) local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * ((HandleClone.Size.Z / 2) - 0.25)
local Hit, Pos, Laser = CastLaser(HandleCloneZ.CFrame.p, (Humanoid.TargetPoint - StartingPosition), 25, {Character})
local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit)
if character and character.Parent and humanoid and humanoid.Parent and character:FindFirstChild("Head") then
if not character:FindFirstChild(Necklace.Name) then local NecklaceClone = Necklace:Clone() Debris:AddItem(NecklaceClone, 20) NecklaceClone.Parent = character end
for i = 1, math.random(5, 10) do for ii = 1, math.random(10, 25) do local PlayerHead = character.Head if PlayerHead then local Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random()) Part.Name = "Confetti" Part.CanCollide = false Part.Velocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-1, 1), 0, math.random(-1, 1)) * 10 local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Brick Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 0.5, 1) Mesh.Parent = Part Debris:AddItem(Part, 5) Part.Parent = character local PlayerHeadClone = PlayerHead:Clone() local PlayerHeadCloneY = PlayerHeadClone:Clone() PlayerHeadCloneY.CFrame = PlayerHeadCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) PlayerHeadCloneY.CFrame = PlayerHeadCloneY.CFrame + PlayerHeadCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * (PlayerHeadCloneY.Size.Y * 2) Part.CFrame = PlayerHeadCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(-math.rad(90), 0, 0) end end wait(0.01) end
end
wait(1)
Tool.Enabled = true end end
function OnEquipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid") Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) if not Tool.Enabled then wait(3) Tool.Enabled = true end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() MouseDown = true Fire() end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown = false end) end
function OnUnequipped() MouseDown = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") PlaySound = Handle:WaitForChild("PlaySound")
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
PlaySound.Changed:connect(function() if PlaySound.Value ~= "" then local SoundId = PlaySound.Value PlaySound.Value = "" local Sound = Instance.new("Sound") Sound.Looped = false Sound.Pitch = 1 Sound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=" .. SoundId Sound.PlayOnRemove = false Sound.Volume = 1 Debris:AddItem(Sound, 3) Sound.Parent = Handle wait() Sound:Play() end end)
